description.ko: 복잡한 오디오 주파수를 유동적이고 빛나는 건축적 형태로 번역하여 움직이는 소리의 순수한 본질을 포착하는 몰입형 시각적 여정입니다.
description.en: An immersive visual journey that translates complex audio frequencies into fluid, glowing architectural forms, capturing the raw essence of sound in motion.

prompt: Cinematic macro shot of fluid 3D sound waves, iridescent glowing particles reacting to deep bass frequencies, rhythmic geometric displacements in a dark obsidian void, neon cyan and electric violet lighting, 8k resolution, abstract motion graphics, high-speed shutter effect
